answers.answer: As with everything in pregnancy it varies from person to parson and baby to baby. Once it was later on same day and once 3 weeks before. Of course my others I never noticed but with all my nightly bathroom trips it's not surprising. Best of luck x
Lost mine a few days ago. 36 weeks now. Doc said its common to lose it weeks before, that it isn't any real indication of when labour will start.

question: Hello i am a second time mom with gestational diabetes. I never lost the plug the first time around and was enduced due to my GD a week early. I lost the plug this time and was curious  about other second time moms and If you went in to labor soon after or a week after or what your experience was?
title: Mucus plug
